get_battery_projection(battery)[source]¶

creates a projection matrix that extracts all battery quantities that are defined as variables (\(E, P_c, P_d\)) from the state vector of a single problem

Parameters:battery (pfnet.Battery) – the battery to create the projection matrix for``
Returns:a \(n \times |x|\) sparse matrix where \(n\) is the number of variables of the battery`
Return type:scipy.sparse.coo_matrix
get_battery_var_projection(bus)[source]¶

creates a projection matrix that extracts the variables (for all t) for all batteries connected to the given bus from the state vector x

Parameters:bus – the bus the matrix should be created for
Returns:a n x |x| sparse matrix where n is the number of variables of all

batteries ( and all t) and |x| is the size of the (multi-period) state vector :rtype: scipy.sparse.coo_matrix
